input.sentences: the family decided to take a trip to a nearby farm that also allowed pets .
they met a friendly baby sheep that wanted pets .
the sheep 's mom showed up to watch over her baby .
the farm serves fresh pizza made with its own cheese .
it got cold outside | so they stopped by the farm 's indoor cafe for some coffee before heading home .
output.sentences: We took a trip with the pets to a nearby park
We even met some sheep and got to pet them
The mom sheep watched me intently
We found a restaurant that serves fresh pizza
We stopped indoor for coffee on the way home
